DOC.brief_title: The Relation Between Serum Ascorbic Acid Concentration Preterm Premature Rupture Membranes
DOC.detailed_description: The micronutrient vitamin C effective water soluble antioxidant scavenges several reactive oxygen specie , thus reduce oxidative stress , It also act enzymatic cofactor enzyme lysyl hydroxylase prolyl hydroxylase , require synthesis hydroxyproline hydroxylysine , Collagen require hydroxyproline bridge across triple helix provide stability , Ascorbic acid also cause regulation metalloproteinase-2 biosynthesis collagen require formation triple helical structure collagen . Thus , ascorbic acid participate equilibrium synthesis degradation collagen may critical reduce occurrence preterm PROM .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancies Gestational age 2837 week Rupture membrane diagnose history , sterile speculum examination confirm fluid leakage cervical canal Patients multiple pregnancy Smoker Polyhydramnios Maternal disease : anemia , diabetes , UTI , RTI vaginal infection History PPROM previous pregnancy Evidence chorioamnionitis current pregnancy
